scripts.build: pip install django && pip install mysql-connector-python && pip install mysqlclient && pip install ../modules/cssow/dist/cssow_drussell1974-2.8.6-py3-none-any.whl && pip install djangorestframework && pip install selenium
scripts.test: python ./web/manage.py test ./web && python -m unittest discover --start-directory ./tests/ui_test/ -p uitest_*.py
